item.description:
This is one of Milford's new restaurants, and I have heard it is very good.

The concept on which Bridge House based their restaurant is known throughout Europe as the Gastropub. A Gastropub is a restaurant with a casual, relaxed atmosphere, similar to the English / Irish Pub, with menu choices of a quality that would be found in the best fine dining restaurants. The Bridge House is the first Gastropub to open in the state of Connecticut. They offer a main dining room, a bar room, and a lower level that is suitable for any type of event, as well as a patio.

Let's Try it out!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: June- The Bridge House
